subject: Fix: Critical bug in payment processing
body:
This commit addresses a critical bug where payments were failing under certain conditions.
The fix involves validating user input more thoroughly and ensuring transaction atomicity.

subject: Feat: Implement new user dashboard
body:
Adds a new dashboard for users to view their activity and manage settings.
Includes widgets for recent activity, account summary, and quick links.
stats:
app/controllers/dashboard_controller.rb | 35 +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
 app/views/dashboard/index.html.erb    | 75 +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
 config/routes.rb                      |  1 +
 3 files changed, 111 insertions(+)

subject: Refactor: Authentication module
body:
Refactored the authentication module for better code clarity and to prepare for OAuth2 integration.
No functional changes in this commit.
